specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Good, the first employee who finished work on $0 will get 5 Morale Boost.
When the work is done, the physical health of the employee was healed, and the employee will get Morale Boost based on the result.
When the work result was Bad or the employee had temperance Level 2 or lower, the employee broke down the wine glass and right after all Morale Boosts transformed into Tipsy.
If $0 has a Fairy Wine ready, the next employee that entered its Containment Unit will drink it and get 5 Tipsy.
